about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Cargosol Logistics Limited is a complete 3 PL (third-party logistics) service provider, delivering end-to-end solutions in the logistics and supply chain domain involving multimodal transport operations (MTO), owning and operating container, sea and air freight, transportation, warehousing, custom clearance services and handling of project cargo.

The company also provide warehousing facilities to the customers and the warehouses are well connected to several manufacturing and consumption clusters located in Thane, Maharashtra.

The company also handle NVOCC (Non-Vessel Owning Common Carrier) facility for the sectors like Indian Sub-continent, Middle East, Upper Gulf, South East Asia and part of Europe through our slot arrangements with feeder operator as well as with mainline operators.

The company is headquartered in Mumbai and has a presence in major locations such as Kalamboli, Pune, New Delhi, Chennai and a warehouse located at Thane.

Cargosol Logistics Limited's customers operate in various sectors across India, including automotive and heavy engineering, telecom, food and agro, fastmoving consumer goods ("FMCG"), paint and dairy.

For the period ending December 31, 2021, and the year ended on March 31, 2021, 2020 and 2019 our total revenue as per Restated Financial Statements were Rs. 135.17 crores, Rs. 103.59 crores, Rs. 64.12 crores and Rs. 55.90 crores respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Cargosol Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Cargosol Logistics IPO is a SME IPO of 2700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.56 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹28 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2022, and closes on September 30, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Cargosol Logistics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Cargosol Logistics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Cargosol Logistics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Cargosol Logistics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Cargosol Logistics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Cargosol Logistics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Cargosol Logistics IPO opens on September 28, 2022 and closes on September 30, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Cargosol Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: Cargosol Logistics IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Cargosol Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Cargosol Logistics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Cargosol Logistics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Cargosol Logistics IPO will be done on Thursday, October 6, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, October 10, 2022. Check the Cargosol Logistics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Cargosol Logistics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Cargosol Logistics IPO listing date is on Monday, October 10, 2022.
